text: hi
hello how are you
I'm great. What about you?
Doing well other than poison ivy on my arms.  Thank you.
Oh my. How did that happen?
Weed wacking some tall grass and not realizing I was getting it all over my arms
Wow. I don't do yard work, so I have no idea.
I usually don't either, but lesson learned!
So where are you from?
The great midwest! You?
The South. North Carolina, specifically. What is the Midwest like?
Its nice. Cold about half the year. Can't complain though. What about the south?
It's really hot here, pretty much all the time. I like the mix of urban and rural that we have going on so that's good.
Thats awesome! I enjoy the heat, but too much and I get a little woozy.
Right. I know that feeling. Have you heard of a charity called Save the Children?
I sure have!
I was wondering if you would like to donate some of your payment(between $0 and $2) to them?
I sure would! Do you know what part of the charity my donation would go to?
I'm not sure but the research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children.
That sounds great! I will donate a dollar!
Great. Wow. You're awesome!
Well, I couldn't be awesome without my awesome partner!
Aww. Thanks, well have a good night/evening. It was great to talk to you.
